TEXT.S:
Syria u Syria sa i labu nu Ya-Cuo, itiza i 35 00 N, 38 00 E. u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa 185,180 sq km. u ahebal nu lala'ay sa 183,630 sq km, u ahebal nu nanumay sa 1,550 sq km. hamin nu tademaw sa 17,185,170. kakalukan umah sa 75.80%, kilakilangan umah sa 2.70%, zumaay henay umah sa 21.50%. 194411194647·Bashar al-Assad 1944 a mihcaan cacay a bulad cacay a demiad, pasubana' tu nika isiteked nu binacadan. 1946 a mihcaan sepat bulad pitu a demiad, sululen nu lenhekuoatu hemin hu binacadan a patizeng tiy si-li-ya. tapang ayza mukeliday pa-sa-el.a-say-de (·), matulin a malais a binacadan, kiwasak sa ayza namalais, makuwan nu mibulibulay na hiza u nisululan a binacadan, si-li-yaa sihu naluyaluyay a paculiay tu sihu atu miculiyenpangnu si-li-ya. [1]
tapang tusu nu kanatalu tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Damascus.
kakinginan nu kanatal demiadkakinging nu kanatal demiad sa 17 bulad 4 demiad.
tabakiay a tapang nu kanatalu tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Bashar al-Assad, micakat a demiad sa i 2000 a mihca pitu bulad sabaw pitu a demiad.
cunliu cunli nu Syriaayza sa ci Hussein Arnousn (·), micakat a demiad sa i 2020 a mihcaan 8 bulad 30 demiad.
kakitidaan185,180 u sela nu si-li-ya185,180 pin-fang-kung-li, pasuni alawan nu yi-se-liyeke-lan-kaw-ti, i satipan nu ya-cuo-ta-luo, malalutin atu tu-el-cii saamisan malalutin in sawaliyan atu i-la-kemalutin i satimula tu ye-tani teban nu satip atu timul, malalutin tu li-pa-nenatu pa-le-se-tansatipan silaed tu ti-cung-haymasasu paengaw atu say-pu-lu-senamaka satipan atu saamisa pasa wali atu timul masalaya a mangangiw. : kapah a palasepaten ku sela nu binacadan
2841; 183; ; satipan u diheb laed nu tusaay a buyu', pasu 2841 m u satalakaway a buyu' nu binacadan i tebal nu satip atu timul siye-he-santeban nu satip atu amis mililis tu ti-cung-haya enal 1831 km ku lalaya nu dadipasan u cayay ka adihay nu silutukay a sela. sawalian u makalalumaay talakaway a lala'. teban nu wali atu timu u bunabunakan nu si-li-ya251980"Al Jazira""Hawran" makedal ku demiad nu si-li-ya "" anu palalimaen misisis ku kakitidaan, tuluay a benis i, cacay a mihcaan tusa badaan izaw ku lima mm tu udad, malawa nu talakaway a buyu'. u lilis nu dadipasan tu saamisan a kakitidaan, u kutiay a demiad nu ti-cung-hay timulan a kakitizaan, u kutiay a bunabunakan, u sidamekay sela, u pitebanan nu binacadan, namaka 1980 a mihca a alingatu, mahica nakamuan a pananum, cayay patuku a mitdas a kakaumahan a sela, i teban nu wali atu amisay "AI Jazira" aut timulay "Hawran" u pitebanan nu kakaumahan. 15"" sawaliay a yu-huwa-la-ti-heu tatebanan nu binacadan a sauwac. mamin a kayzaan ku sawali a lala' nu binacadan. tiya makayza i-la-kea tayzal puo-se-wan nikayzaan nu yu-huwa-la-ti-he15 a binacadan, u sasakamuan ku kapahay ku nikaudip atipan a diheb i zaw ku a-si-hemakayza i tu-el-cia micumdi ti-cung-hayteban nu sati atu timu nu binacadan u tapang a tukay tay-ma-se-kesaamisanay a-le-puoatu huwo-mu-seu pitebanan a tukay nu si-li-yaa luma' a tukay mililis amin i dadipasa. [2]
singciw90%70%20% ayzaay a si-li-yau i-se-lan-ciyawku tebanan a misinziya, mu-se-lina tademaw 90%, 70% a tademaw u san-ni-paykumud nu se-ye-paymaka 20%, se-ye-paysibenis hen tu a-la-way-payse-el-i-ma-mu-payatu i-se-ma-yi-pay. 10% matenesay tu ku laylay nu ciwlunu si-li-ya, na u ciwlua binacadan ku si-li-yamalingatu a idebung mikuwan ku baluhayay a i-se-lan-ciyawmaka ala tu 1000 a mihca, aluman ku misiziyaay nu si-li-yatademaw tu ciwlu, nika ayza 100 a mihca malalais anabulaw tayza nutawan a binacadan, cayay tu kalecuh tu atungay, u misinziya tu ciwlu a tademaw mabulaw tu ayaytu ka adihay ku tademaw i binacadan, 10% tu ku tademaw u miciwluay nu si-li-ya. nika sibunawan han nu sihu ku misinziyaay tu ciwlua tademaw.
i niyazu' nu micuwluay a tademaw nu si-li-yanu ukasi a-la-mi-ihen ku kamuen, luma' u ya-ce-diTe-lu-cea misinziyaay atu dadaay a yu-taya tademaw.[3]
laylay20006930·Hafez al-Assad·Bashar al-Assad7172005426 2000 mihcaan 6 bulad 9 demiad, mapatay ku pamikuwanay 30 a mihca ci ha-fye-ce.a -say-de (·) saka tusa a wawa 'a-sa-el.a -say-de (·) mala satapangay nu binacadan. 7 a bulad 17 a demiad a alingatu. 2005 mihica 4 bulad 26 demiadmiduduc tu nalahecian nu liyen-he-kuoku si-li-ya, manukas ku hitay namaka li-pa-nenmasatelep mamilangat midebung tu li-pa-nen. 2007527·797.62%2014 2007a mihcaan lima a bulad tusa bataan izaw ku sepat misingkiw tu saka tusa nu piut a mihca a mala satapangay nu binacadan, 97.62% ku misuluay a mala satapangay tangasa 2014 mihca. 2011126"" 2011/1/26 cung-tunga kakitizaan a binacadan macacengan u a-la-puo-ce-cunga kawaw, malingatu a simibulibulay tu sihu nu si-li-yanika mapenec tu nu sihu. uyza mibulibulay tu sihu a tademaw malalais ayza atu sihu.[4] 20138""21Barack Obama20159 2013/8 u huwa-siye-u-ciku sapipenec ni a-say-detu binawlan nu nikuwanan niza mala salaecusay sakatalay ku balucu' niza i 21 se-ci nipihiza nizamibabelin tu nabalucuan nu tapang nu a-mi-li-kaci u-pa-ma, malawit ku nihemheman nu balucu', nika cayay saybangi nu hitay nu huwa-fu, maselel ku nipalakapah tu a-mi-li-ka. 2015/9 midebung a miculuk ku hitay nu el-luo-sepadamaan aca nu yi-langmahizatu u sisapikpikay a tula' ci a-say-demalalaisay a kawaw nu labu nu si-li-yamalahic tu. [5] 20155"""" 2015/5 yi-se-lan-kuoa masakaputay militawal tu nikalais nu labu nu binacadan nu si-li-yamatulin a micalap tu sela nu si-li-yaayza maselep ku icelang nu yi-se-lan-kuoi si-li-yanika cuwacuwaay a hitay nu si-li-ya. macacalaphen tu sela nu binacada, ayza nicalapan nu yi-se-lan-kuo tu sela nu si-li-ya, manunultu a alawan nu hitay nu sihu nu si-li-yamicaculiay tu sihu a hitay, ku-el-dea masakaputay tamedaw. [6] 2019Idlib;300360 wamamalasawad ku 2019 a mihca, u micaculiay tu sihu a hitay mitalikul tangasa i yi-de-li-pu-sen, lalabaen nu sihu a hitay nu si-li-ya (, saicelang sa a padama ku el-luo-seatu yi-langtu hitay nu sihu, 300 a mang ku mapatayay nu maluay i yi-de-li-pu-sena tademaw. maligatu namalais tangasa ayza satabakiay a nika lalais i labu nu binacadan satabakiyay a mihinang nu binawlan. 360 a mang tu ku nidiputan nu tu-el-citu tadema, milalang tu hitay nu sihu nu si-li-yatu-el-ci"pey-ye-ceng-yen-kuo" sasa milais sa tu el-luo-se.[7] 20800500 u tulin a malalais nu si-li-yaatu yi-se-lan-kuo, 20 a mang ku mapatayay nu tademaw, 800 a mang ku mihinangay nu labuay nu binacadan a tademaw, malawit nu tayzaay i nutaw a binacadan mihinang a tademaw. nu saka tusa satabakiay a nikalalais nu sikay, u saalumanay nu mihinangay nu tademaw.[8]
